ResourceHeader.Description: NUADU (NeUtral Atom Detection Unit) measures the energetic neutral atoms created by collision of energetic ions with the ambient, cold neutral atoms. Of interest are the energetic neutral atoms coming out of the "Ring Current" belt in the magnetosphere. The Principal Investigator is S. McKenna Lawlor, National University of Ireland, Kildare, Ireland.
